alert.note: Alert for Allegan; Barry (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 9:18PM EDT until April 20 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN ALLEGAN AND NORTHWESTERN BARRY COUNTIES... At 917 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles southeast of Fennville to 7 miles south of Watervliet, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wayland, Middleville and Hastings. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
